review: Item came as expected, in two-day shipping. All I had to do was plug it to my TV and install the app on my Phone.A best deal? I guess you won't find. Inmediately after the setup, Google added $20 to my Play Balance, gave me a Free X-Men movie and 90 days of Play Music Acces. So after all that, you can say it only cost around $12 with two-day shipping free. Happy Customer Here
